io.netty.handler.codec

类 DatagramPacketEncoder<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<AddressedEnvelope<M,InetSocketAddress>>
          • io.netty.handler.codec.DatagramPacketEncoder<M>
  • 类型参数:
    M - the type of message to be encoded
    所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelOutboundHandler

    public class DatagramPacketEncoder<M>
extends MessageToMessageEncoder<AddressedEnvelope<M,InetSocketAddress>>
    An encoder that encodes the content in AddressedEnvelope to DatagramPacket using the specified message encoder. E.g., 
    
 ChannelPipeline pipeline = ...;
 pipeline.addLast("udpEncoder", new DatagramPacketEncoder(new ProtobufEncoder(...));
    Note: As UDP packets are out-of-order, you should make sure the encoded message size are not greater than the max safe packet size in your particular network path which guarantees no packet fragmentation.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明
      DatagramPacketEncoder(MessageToMessageEncoder<? super M> encoder)
      Create an encoder that encodes the content in AddressedEnvelope to DatagramPacket using the specified message encoder.

      Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.close(ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.deregister(ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.disconnect(ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Encode from one message to an other.

      Calls ChannelHandlerContext.fireExceptionCaught(Throwable) to forward to the next ChannelHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Calls ChannelHandlerContext.flush() to forward to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.

      Do nothing by default, sub-classes may override this method.

      • DatagramPacketEncoder

        public DatagramPacketEncoder(MessageToMessageEncoder<? super M> encoder)
        Create an encoder that encodes the content in AddressedEnvelope to DatagramPacket using the specified message encoder.
        参数:
        encoder - the specified message encoder

    • 方法详细资料

      • acceptOutboundMessage

        public boolean acceptOutboundMessage(Object msg)
                              throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: MessageToMessageEncoder
        Returns true if the given message should be handled. If false it will be passed to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline.
        覆盖:
        acceptOutboundMessage 在类中 MessageToMessageEncoder<AddressedEnvelope<M,InetSocketAddress>>
        抛出:
        Exception

      • encode

        protected void encode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                      AddressedEnvelope<M,InetSocketAddress> msg,
                      List<Object> out)
               throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: MessageToMessageEncoder
        Encode from one message to an other. This method will be called for each written message that can be handled by this encoder.
        指定者:
        encode 在类中 MessageToMessageEncoder<AddressedEnvelope<M,InetSocketAddress>>
        参数:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext which this MessageToMessageEncoder belongs to
        msg - the message to encode to an other one
        out - the List into which the encoded msg should be added needs to do some kind of aggregation
        抛出:
        Exception - is thrown if an error occurs

      • bind

        public void bind(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                 SocketAddress localAddress,
                 ChannelPromise promise)
          throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.bind(SocketAddress, ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOutboundHandler in the ChannelPipeline. Sub-classes may override this method to change behavior.
        指定者:
        bind 在接口中 ChannelOutboundHandler
        覆盖:
        bind 在类中 ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        参数:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext for which the bind operation is made
        localAddress - the SocketAddress to which it should bound
        promise - the ChannelPromise to notify once the operation completes
        抛出:
        Exception - thrown if an error occurs
